name: Amazon
summary: Amazon.com, Inc. is a global technology and e-commerce leader known for revolutionizing online shopping, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence. With its expansive product catalog, efficient delivery network, and innovative technologies, Amazon has transformed retail and continues to set industry standards in logistics, customer service, and technological innovation. Its diversified portfolio includes the flagship e-commerce platform, Amazon Web Services (AWS), digital media offerings, and smart devices, making it a pivotal player in numerous industries worldwide.
